forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Lows overnight in the low 40s.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 43F. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High 73F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 23C. Winds ESE at 15 to 30 km/h.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Thunder possible. Low 54F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Thunder possible. Low 12C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext: Scattered thunderstorms in the morning becoming more widespread in the afternoon. High 74F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Scattered thunderstorms in the morning, then mainly cloudy during the afternoon with thunderstorms likely. High 24C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Scattered thunderstorms in the evening, then mainly cloudy overnight with thunderstorms likely. Low around 60F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Scattered thunderstorms during the evening becoming more widespread overnight. Low 16C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext: Thunderstorms likely in the morning. Then the chance of scattered thunderstorms in the afternoon. Potential for severe thunderstorms. High 77F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thunderstorms likely in the morning. Then the chance of scattered thunderstorms in the afternoon. Potential for severe thunderstorms. High around 25C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Scattered thunderstorms in the evening, mainly cloudy late with a few showers. Low 46F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Scattered thunderstorms in the evening with a few showers possible late. Low 9C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
